attributes.action: Change conveyancing laws in England to be similar to that of Scotland.
attributes.additional_details: Millions lost at the cost of purchasers and sellers. Very unfair regulations of foul play and quite distressing when purchase or sale not completed due to unfair reasons
attributes.background: Help safeguard against unreasonable reasons for buyers and sellers to back out of a purchase or sale, or change buyers at the extreme cost of the purchaser when solicitors instructed and process had started

rejection.details:
You may like to sign this petition we currently have open on the topic:

Make home purchases legally binding once an offer is accepted
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580334
